type.description:
### ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ‚ö†Ô∏è

## Can Take Damage

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_take_damage).

Checks if the entity is immune to a damage source.

Type ID: `apugli:can_take_damage`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:can_take_damage",
    "source": {
        "name": "lava"
    }
}
```
This example tests if an entity can take damage from a damage source named `lava`.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Can Take Damage (Entity Condition Type) date: 2023-02-08

Can Take Damage

Entity Condition Type.

Checks if the entity is immune to a damage source.

Type ID: apugli:can_take_damage

Fields

Field Type Default Description
damage_type Identifier The damage type to be tested by this condition.
source Damage Source DEPRECATED Use damage_type instead. More information here.

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:can_take_damage",
    "source": {
        "name": "lava"
    }
}

This example tests if an entity can take damage from a damage source named lava.
